subject: Boats and Boating
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: Richard Branson stood on the deck of the Virgin Money, a 99-foot maxi yacht, with his two children before embarking on a six-day sail across the Atlantic.
snippet: Richard Branson stood on the deck of the Virgin Money, a 99-foot maxi yacht, with his two children before embarking on a six-day sail across the Atlantic.
